p: SAMtools and bcftools packages ( https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/19505943, https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3198575/) were used to perform variant calling on .bam files using the paramenters “mpileup -Bu -d 50000” and “call -O b -v -c -” respectively. Additionally, VCFtools ( https://academic.oup.com/bioinformatics/article/27/15/2156/402296) was used to annotate the variants with the following parameters (—filter Qual = 20/MinDP = 200/SnpGap = 20). Finally, we used SnpEff [ 22] on the .vcf file to gather further insights on the effects of the SNPs found.
